snippet.title: Mercenary Kings - Launch Trailer (Steam)
snippet.description:
Craft your arsenal to avenge your fallen comrades and save the world from the fearsome forces of CLAW!

Official website:
http://www.mercenarykings.com/

OUT NOW ON STEAM!
http://store.steampowered.com/app/218820/

Developed by
TRIBUTE GAMES
http://tributegames.com/

Tags:
Mercenary Kings, Tribute Games, 8-bit, 16-bit, Pixel Art, Paul Robertson, Shooter, Platformer, Steam, PS4, 2D
